text: Nan adarasi, ian tav guizɨn akamɨn tuavim ategh pura akar igharazimɨn gɨn mangam, eghtɨ ian tav uam a inigh izɨ guizɨn akamɨn tuavim datɨgham, kar arazir bar aghuim. Ia akar kam deragh a gɨnɨghnɨgh! Ian tav gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amibar akuraghtɨma me tuavir kuram ategh ua God bagh izegham, an arazir kurabagh amir gumazamizir kabar duabar akuraghtɨma me oveghan kogham. Eghtɨ arazir kamra God arazir kurar avɨriba gɨn amadagham.5:19-20 Marazi ghaze, Kraisɨn gɨn zuir darasi, men marazi Godɨn guizɨn akam ataki. Ezɨ Jems men arazibar kɨrasa, akɨnafarir kam osiri.
